data.name: Naked and Afraid: The Game - Day 1
data.detailed_description:
Upcoming release

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1031120/Bakery_Simulator/


About the Game




Enter the challenge for the true survivors. Choose a contestant with unique traits, grab a survival tool and try to endure for 21 days on the deserted island of the Pacific Ocean.
Hunt, cook and survive ever-changing weather, tropical rains and unbearable heat.
The longer you'll survive, the higher the reward.

Compete with others by surviving as long as you can with finite resources and then get immortalized in the Naked and Afraid ranking system.


Realistic approach, animals react to day and night cycles.
Fire can kindle wood left too close to its source and get extinguished by the water.


Hunt to survive, choose the best time of the day, prepare yourself and try to approach your prey without being seen.

Key Features:


  • Realistic survival
  • Hunt using baits and self-crafted tools,
  • Cook or eat raw,
  • Random conditions on every playthrough,
  • Rogue-lite environment, if you lose it's over,
  • Random survival traits, adapt your gameplay or lose,
  • Buy permanent upgrades

data.short_description: Prologue of Naked and Afraid the game, survive first few days on dangerous island, upgrade camp and hunt.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 / AMD R7-260X
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
